verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> even to <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> that I <S%H2398>sin<s%> not with my <S%H3956>tongue:<s%> I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with a <S%H4269>bridle,<s%> <S%H5750>while<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
I was <S%H481>dumb<s%> with <S%H1747>silence,<s%> I <S%H2814>held<s%> my <S%H2814>peace,<s%> even from <S%H2896>good;<s%> and my <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> was <S%H5916>stirred.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2552>hot<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me, while I was <S%H1901>musing<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burned:<s%> then <S%H1696>spoke<s%> I with my <S%H3956>tongue,<s%>

<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H7093>end,<s%> and the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of my <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H4310>what<s%> it is: that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2310>frail<s%> I am.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you have <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> as an <S%H2947>handbreadth;<s%> and my <S%H2465>age<s%> is as <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you: <S%H389>truly<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> at his <S%H5324>best<s%> <S%H5324>state<s%> is <S%H3605>altogether<s%> <S%H1892>vanity.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H389>Surely<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> in a vain <S%H6754>show:<s%> <S%H389>surely<s%> they are <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in <S%H1892>vain:<s%> he <S%H6651>heaps<s%> up riches, and <S%H3045>knows<s%> not <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H622>gather<s%> them.
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H6960>wait<s%> I for? my <S%H8431>hope<s%> is in you.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> me not the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5036>foolish.<s%>
I was <S%H481>dumb,<s%> I <S%H6605>opened<s%> not my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H6213>did<s%> it.
<S%H5493>Remove<s%> your <S%H5061>stroke<s%> away from me: I am <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by the <S%H8409>blow<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

When you with <S%H8433>rebukes<s%> do <S%H3256>correct<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> you make his <S%H2530>beauty<s%> to <S%H4529>consume<s%> away like a <S%H6211>moth:<s%> <S%H389>surely<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H7775>cry;<s%> <S%H2790>hold<s%> not your <S%H2790>peace<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> my <S%H1832>tears:<s%> for I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> with you, and a <S%H8453>sojourner,<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1>fathers<s%> were.
O <S%H8159>spare<s%> me, that I may <S%H1082>recover<s%> <S%H1082>strength,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H2088>hence,<s%> and be <S%H369>no<s%> more.
